column5: At work. My co-worker and boss are fine with me leaving early, and i have stat hours to cover a half day off. My son is at the sitters till 5pm, my wife is home anyway. The sun is out and my boat ready to rock 'n' roll....hmmmmmmmmmm....tough call.
you have to ask?  bad day of fishn > good day at work
If you need to ask you might as well stay at work lol Tight Lines SBK
You are a sick man Simon....stop teasing us and just send the freakin' report when you get home.
As the man in black says, "I'd be gone like a wild goose in winter"  GIT!!!!
If you go, you won't be able to see what finger I have for you to see.
Fishing up there in paradise probably gets boring you should stay at work....
Should I stay or should I go now? If I go there will be trouble And if I stay it will be double So come on and let me know
Should I stay or should I go?  The indecision's bugging me....
Bet you can see my finger now.   Tough to beat that for a day of work.
Dat aint you. So where ya get the pic?
Awesome Simon. It was very nice in Dryden today. By the way, I hope that you don't catch that cold that's going around town. It's nasty.
